name: Lavos Glyph - Bright
description: A glyph depicting Lavos on a bright background.

languages.name: Glyphe: Lavos (Hell)

languages.name: 라보스 글리프 - 밝음

languages.description: Un glifo que representa a Lavos sobre un fondo brillante.
languages.name: Glifo de Lavos - Brillante

languages.name: Lavos 浮印 - 明亮

languages.name: Glifo: Lavos (Claro)

languages.description: 一枚描繪 Lavos 在明亮背景下的浮印。

languages.name: Яскравий гліф «Лавос»
